title: naim027
author: naim027
created_time: October 12, 2022, 01:41:45 PMLast edit: October 12, 2022, 02:52:54 PM by naim027
content: Hello World!It's been 146 days! I was banned. But Bitcointalk Moderators gave me another chance.Thank you to everyone who supported/opposed me. Thank you for your healthy criticism. It helped me to learn a good lesson.It took around four hours to share my first post. I was busy checking my old posts, so I don't get banned again for the same reason.Quote from: shahzadafzal on October 12, 2022, 10:07:48 AMCongratulation naim027 these things are rare but happens Thank you, Bhai. I appreciate your support. Quote from: Ratimov on October 12, 2022, 10:18:00 AMA fair decision on the unbanned naim027, although somewhat delayed in time. My congratulations to naim027, he did not lose hope of being unbanned and continued all this time to constantly fight for the right to be a full user of the forum.Now it remains to deal with the negative tag, which should be removed, since it does not correspond to reality.Thank you, Ratimov. The support you guys have shown for an unknown internet guy is appreciatable.Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on October 12, 2022, 10:51:02 AMnaim027, I also join in the congratulations. I removed the neutral review because I think that having survived the time of the ban, you will never step on the old rake again. Being in your position a few years ago, I, like no one else, can understand your joy. You have not given up for a long time. It is worthy of recognition.Thank you, dear. I have learned a good lesson. Thanks for pointing out my mistakes, and also, thanks for removing the feedback.Quote from: indah rezqi on October 12, 2022, 01:15:45 PMI didn't engage in a single conversation in this thread, but I know finally now the ban on naim027 has unbanned. Obviously this should be good news for naim027 after a long struggle to appeal againt his account. Congratulations naim027, your appeal was successful and now everyone wishes you not to make the same mistake again in the future.Welcome back naim027.Thank you, indah. I appreciate your support and warm welcome.Quote from: Royse777 on October 12, 2022, 01:17:56 PMCongratulations Naim027 for this deserved 2nd chance. I hope you are going to use it and make an example to inspire others with a great comeback by being a good asset to the community. You patience and integrity was excellent thought out the process.Thanks, Royse, I made a no or a little contribution to the forum. But, Luckily moderators considered my contributions as good and given me another chance. Quote from: Shamm on October 12, 2022, 01:35:02 PMWow that's a good news, another user have given a second chance to use this forum again after a few months for being banned. And also I congratulate Naim027 you deserve a second chance as your work and contribution here in forum are clear and good you've done a lot of things also I salute you for being patients you did not give up and  now you are free once again and for sure this will be your motivation to be more successful in the near future.  Once again congrats friend.Thank you, Shamm. I already answered on Telegram. Thanks for wishing me luck. Trust me, The world is full of good people. We just don't realize it. Chief.Naim027
